Posts.Content: Mar 8, 2013 01:58PM PattiTris1965 wrote: A coworker insisted that I call after I posted this so I did.  I spoke to the RN at the office and she pulled out my notes that the dr had written.  She read back to me a pretty clear description of what I was seeing and that the dr believes it to be scarring and she is not concerned about it at all.  I felt better after speaking to the nurse and now, a few days later the "bumps" in my left breast have continued to change and the very clear bump has flattened and spread out.
Posts.Title: Lump after lumpectomy - starting to obsess PattiTris1965 marjie
